description:
***FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME***

***REAL CAVEMAN KENO RULES***

Caveman Keno is the game only game that gives the player the advantage IF they know how to play the game appropriately. You have bigger chances of winning!

Players select up to 10 numbers in the range of 1 to 80. Upon selecting these numbers, the game will start. Caveman Keno will mark the numbers that are randomly generated using the rock Keno graphics.

The game does not end there. The final step is to look for the numbers marked and compare them with the 20 numbers selected by the machine. If there is a match, the winnings of the players will be increased. For example, if one number has a match then the winnings of the players will be multiplied to one. On the other hand, if two of the numbers have matches, then the players' winnings will be multiplied to four and if all of the eggs have matches, the winnings will be multiplied to 10.

Download this app! Caveman Keno is the top casino game to enhance your money, you will also enjoy the game.
